EmailTemplate.name: Generic Test Result
EmailTemplate.subject: Result for the Pre-Qualification test
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
You have successfully completed Pre-Qualification test and you have scored {!test.Mark} out of {!test.totalQuestion}.
For any future references you can visit our website, by clicking Code Gladiators.
Credentials for login : Username : {!Contact.Email} Password : {!contact.Password}
Best Wishes Utilitarian Lab
